gen.desc: Generate commands using a template, iterable input params and the mapping

iterate.desc: Generate parameter dictionaries from command line arguments (some of which are given as lists/ranges)

map_keys.desc: Return the list of keys of build_map dictionary

map_values.desc: Return the list of values of a particular build_map mapping

show.desc: Shows data content of a specific cmdgen entry

desc: simplify running the vqe pipeline and recording the results
